content.p: BFM Radio Internship Description: BFM debuted in September 2008, an independent radio station focused on business news and current affairs. The station also strives to meet the lifestyle needs of its listeners - including health, fashion, the arts and sports. BFM provides listeners with a classic music experience. BFM has a positive bias towards supporting start-ups, new technology, ethical business practices and equal opportunities. We target business executives, business owners, investors and people who aspire to personal and professional success. BFM also offers business education programmes spanning marketing, finance, technology and business productivity to raise the management proficiency of Malaysian professionals. BFM can be heard on frequency 89.9 in Wilayah Persekutuan, Selangor, Negeri Sembilan and parts of Malacca. How to apply: Every year BFM offers a limited number of production internships with highly qualified students or recent graduates. To be considered for these two to four-month internships, please send us your CV with a cover letter to careers@bfm.my with the word 'Internship Candidate' in the subject line. These internships offer limited remuneration. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
